lead_paragraph: Former Wimbledon champion Pat Cash has urged Nick Kyrgios to cut out distractions such as social media and practice harder to fulfil his potential, but the Australian firebrand responded by telling Cash to mind his own business -- via Twitter.

headline.print_headline: Cash Tells Kyrgios to Ditch Twitter, Train Harder
headline.main: Cash Tells Kyrgios to Ditch Twitter, Train Harder

snippet: Former Wimbledon champion Pat Cash has urged Nick Kyrgios to cut out distractions such as social media and practice harder to fulfil his potential, but the Australian firebrand responded by telling Cash to mind his own business -- via Twitter....
